Amplify Vision.description:
Cast: Focus your closed breach with the lowest focus cost.
Deal 2 damage. If all of your breaches are opened, deal 1 additional damage.
Amplify Vision.name: Ampligy Vision

Tea House.extra: First the +1 SunToken happens, which may trigger a Prophecy; then you get +1 Card, +1 Action, and +2 Coins.
Tea House.name: Tea House
